func.title: Trans_Mul

param.name: first
param.desc: First matrix as returned by Trans_Identity, Trans_Translate, Trans_Rotate or Trans_Scale.
An arbitrary number of other matrices.

func.desc: Multiplies two or more 3x4 transformation matrices in the given order. This way the effects of more than one transformation can be combined. The result can be used as a transformation for AttachMesh or for the "PictureTransformation" or "MeshTransformation" properties (see Meshes).

example.text: Rotates the picture graphics of the calling object by 20 degrees around the Y axis and afterwards displaces it by 7 units into Z direction towards the camera.
